data.name: Da Big Un'
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage to up to 9 enemies 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: 'Ave Another One
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will deal an additional X elemental damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Big Brawlin'
data.description: Big Swing now deals elemental damage and attacks twice.

data.name: Big Slash
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage to up to 9 targets 25 feet from you, and knocks them back.

data.name: Big Swing
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You furiously swing your weapon in a wide circle, dealing X physical damage to up to 9 targets within 30 feet.

data.name: Bring 'Em On
data.description: Whenever you parry, you will gain an effect for 5 seconds. If you have a great weapon equipped, you will take 10% less damage. If you have a shield equipped, you will deal 10% more damage.

data.name: Can't Hit Me!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Increase block chance by 50%.

data.name: Can't Touch Us
data.description: Group members within 100 feet will absorb up to 4500 damage over 30 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge up to 9 opponents 65 feet in front of you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Changin' Da Plan
data.note: This ability does not trigger the GCD
data.description:
You suddenly realize that you could smash things better with a different plan.

No Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
Da Good Plan: You gain Da Best Plan.
Da Best Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.

data.name: Clobber
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Slashes for X physical damage. Damage from this ability will generate double threat in NPCs.

data.name: Da Biggest!
data.description:
A mighty war cry that weakens your foes and gives you their strengths. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal a (3 * rank) ability bonus to stat points from up to 9 targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will gain an ability bonus to the stat stolen.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Da Greenest
data.description:
A Waaaghy bellow. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to cause your target to take X elemental damage. Whenever this happens, the next hit the target receives from any source will automatically be a critical hit.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Da Toughest!
data.description:
A grand war cry to proclaim yourself da toughest! All your attacks gain a 25% chance to activate a protective barrier on all groupmates within 100 feet that absorbs up to X damage for 10 seconds.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Deafening Bellow!
data.description: Up to 9 enemies within 40 feet of you take 600 + 1.0 STR physical damage over 6 seconds. They are silenced during this time. This effect only provides 15 seconds of immunity.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that causes target to take a 1200 morale penalty to armor and deals 600 + 1.5 STR physical damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you, reducing their damage dealt by 50% for 7 seconds.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to spirit resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and elemental resistance.

data.name: Down Ya Go
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals X physical damage and knocks target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Rush
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 25% for 8 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 8 seconds have passed.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: Taunt will now apply 10 stacks to the target.

data.name: Follow 'me Lead
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: You batter your target to show the runts how it's don. You deal X elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Get 'Em
data.description: An encouraging bellow that causes group members within 100 feet to have 25% reduced AP costs for 10 seconds.

data.name: Good Wif Shield
data.description: Increases block chance by 10%. Tuffer N' Nails and Ya Missed Me now lasts 10 seconds.

data.name: Gork Smash!
data.description: Increases critical hit chance by 15% for 6 seconds after using one of your Da' Best Plan abilities.

data.name: Guud at Big Choppin!
data.description: When you are wielding a greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: While channeling, you will mark up to 48 enemies 65 feet in front of you and up to 9 allies 65 feet behind you. Enemies that are marked will deal 50% less area of effect damage to allies that are marked. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to wounds.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain 25 stacks of immaculate defense for 20 seconds. Each stack grants 3% damage reduction. A stack is removed each time a target takes direct damage, and 5 stacks are removed if the target takes single target damage.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Less Stabbin' Me
data.description: Increases block and parry by 8% for 6 seconds after using a Da' Best Plan ability.

data.name: Lob Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X damage. Has a chance to deal Y damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Lookin' For Opp'tunity
data.description: Clobber now causes the target to lose 15 morale per second for 10 seconds.

data.name: Loudmouth
data.description: Da Biggest, Da Toughest, and Da Greenest now deal X elemental damage to the target that triggers them.

data.name: No Shootin' Me
data.description: Increases dodge and disrupt by 15% for 6 seconds after using a Da' Best Plan ability.

data.name: Not in da face!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Groupmates within 100 feet will have their cooldowns decreased by 5 seconds for 10 seconds. In addition, your next melee attack within 5 seconds will deal X physical damage and cause the target to have their cooldowns increased by 5 seconds for 10 seconds.

data.name: Puddle o Muck
data.description: Up to 15 enemies within 30 feet of the spot you select are snared by 50% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Quit Yer Squabblin'
data.description: Target groupmate gains 50% parry, dodge, and disrupt for 7 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: For the next 7 seconds, up to 48 enemies within 65 feet frontal cone will take a 800 morale penalty to armor and a 300 morale penalty to all resistances. This effect can stack up to 3 times per target.

data.name: Right in Da Jibblies
data.note: Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You knee your target in a vital spot, inflicting X physical damage. This ability cannot be blocked or parried.

data.name: Rock 'Ard
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Activates a protective shield on yourself and any of your groupmates within 80 feet of you that absorbs up to Y over 10 seconds.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to toughness

data.name: Save Da Runts
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.

data.name: Savin' Me Hide
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Group members within 100 feet will deal 10% increased magic damage for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one enchantment from your enemy and deals X damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain a 40% increased chance to block and a 25% increased chance to parry, dodge, and disrupt for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

data.name: Shut Yer Face
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Your ruthlessly shout towards the enemy, dealing X physical damage and silencing them for 4 seconds.

data.name: Skull Thumper
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A pounding blow to your opponent's skull that deals X elemental damage and for the next 15 seconds their head will ring for Y elemental damage whenever they are critically hit.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: Gain 25% critical hit damage.

data.name: Stop Hittin' Da Runts
data.description: You gain 30 action points whenever one of your War Bellows trigger. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: T'ree Hit Combo
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: You swing your weapon lots, hitting 5 times over 3 seconds, dealing X physical damage. As Da' Big Boss would say, "Countin' is for Stuntiez."

data.name: Trip 'Em Up
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You "trip" your opponent by hacking at their legs for X physical damage, reducing their movement speed by 30% for 8 seconds.

data.name: Triple Trip
data.description: Trip 'Em Up will now hit 2 additional targets within 15 feet of the primary target.

data.name: Tuffer 'n Nails
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You slame your body into your enemy, dealing X physical damage and gaining a (30 * rank) ability bonus to armor for 5 seconds.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: WAAAAAAAGH!
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals X elemental damage to up to 9 targets within 30 feet. Also causes targets to take a (7.5 * rank) ability penalty to elemental resistance for 20 seconds. Groupmates within 100 feet of you will have their auto attack damage increased by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Walk it off!
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet gains a 300 toughness for 30 seconds.

data.name: We'z Bigger
data.note:
Requires Shield
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. All groupmates within 100 feet gan a (3 * rank) bonus to wounds and +5% block chance for 20 seconds.

data.name: Where You Going?
data.description: You root four enemies within 30 feet of you, preventing them fom moving for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Wot Armor?
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You smash your weapon into your target, dealing X physical damage and causing them to take a (15 * rank) ability penalty to armor for 20 seconds.

data.name: Ya Missed Me
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Target's damage done is reduced to 80% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Yer Nothin
data.description: Target takes a 300 morale penalty to toughness and loses 10 morale per second for 30 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuffin'
data.description: When Da Biggest, Da Toughest, and Da Greenest trigger they will now restore X health immediately and another Y health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet.

data.name: You Wot?
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You gain (11.25 * rank) ability bonus to all resistances and 20% parry, dodge, and disrupt for 10s. Anytime you are directly attacked for the duration, you will gain (1 * rank) weaponskill for 10 seconds. This can stack up to 10 times.

data.name: Youz see me blok' dat'?!
data.description: Whenever you block an attack you will deal X physical damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you.
